title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.13 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.13 - Exemptions

State Regulations

This Part does not apply to: (a) beverage containers which are
manufactured, bottled, canned, filled or packaged in this State, and which are
sold outside of this State; or
(b) beverages in beverage containers which are sold or distributed to consumers
aboard aircraft. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
367.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
